name: Cat Journey
description:
Use up arrow to Jump, right and left arrow to move and p to pause the game.

Hope you enjoy this game let me know what do you think, feedback is highly appreciated :3.

If you are a pixel artist and you are willing to work with me in this project and make new sprites for it don't hesitate to contact me (not paid).

The game is made with Unreal Engine.

Current version: 0.1

E-mail: aylahjomri@yahoo.com

Discord: Dindon farcis#6853
